channel.title: Decent VPS
channel.description:
I need one that can hold a minimum of 40 players.
CentOS preferred :S

item.title: Decent VPS
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:5, topic:426238”]Keep all of your VPS questions to the stickie, please.[/quote]This, there is a sticky in the general questions section.

However, as a side-note, it should be noted that the amount of RAM you need is completely dependent on the source you use.

Read full topic

item.title: Decent VPS
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

I’ve used VPSLand before, they’re decent. If I were you I’d try to find a site offering free trials. I’ve used one that was offering a free 3 months. It had decent stats too for a free trial: 4GB of RAM, which is more than enough to hold your 40 players.

Read full topic

item.title: Decent VPS
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:

item.title: Decent VPS
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“Hash1 Single, post:3, topic:426238”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=528927.msg3858394#msg3858394 date=1324509247]
I used to use next level, it’s shut down now though. You could get one though VPSland, despite their high prices, they’re one of the biggest companies. For 40 players, you may want to get 2Gs of ram or so, I held arround 35 on a 2.5 without lagg and a Terraria server up as well.
[/quote]

I nearly cried wen I saw vpslands prices lol[/quote]
Yeah, I know. There are alternatives, but hard to find a decent one.

Read full topic
